name: UKC - Ultimate Kaiju Championship
description:
A game made by me and a my friend bubassasoft for Kaiju Jam  2, the game is about a mantis shrimp who dreams of becoming champion of fights between kaiju.

Controls:

Z: Left Punch

Z and Up Key: High Left Punch

Z and Down Key: Low Left Punch

X: Right Punch

X and Up Key: Low Right Punch

X and Down Key: High Right Punch

Our profiles on itch.io:

- BubasaSoft: https://bubasasoft.itch.io/

- IrenildoJunior :https://irenildojunior.itch.io/

Sound Assets by:

- Cutting sound: https://freesound.org/people/SypherZent/

- Punch sound: https://freesound.org/people/qubodup/

- Victory theme: https://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?Search=Search&isrc=USUAN12...
